Sound Credits
=============

Here's the credits for each sound effect, downloaded from free sources.
I've manipulated all of them in one way or another.

pill.ogg
--------
https://freesound.org/people/elmasmalo1/sounds/377020/

gulp1.ogg, gulp2.ogg
--------------------
https://freesound.org/people/GagaMan/sounds/88510/

burps1.ogg, burp2.ogg, burp3.ogg, burp4.ogg
-------------------------------------------
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/215322/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/215321/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/215320/
https://freesound.org/people/Reitanna/sounds/215319/

alert1.ogg
----------
https://freesound.org/people/philitup321/sounds/204369/

complete1.ogg
-------------
https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/234563/
